function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient evidence for entry port screening and social distancing","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in preventing epidemic spreading","Mitigation":"Rely on plain hygienic measures with strong evidence","Technologies":"N/A","People":"General population, stakeholders responsible for public health","Owner":"Public health authorities, policymakers, government"},{"Description":"Lack of clear evidence on protective measures","Impact":"Increased risk of harm due to impulsive actions and misallocation of resources","Mitigation":"Rely on evidence-based measures and prioritize non-impulsive decision-making","Technologies":"N/A","People":"General population, medical personnel, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, policymakers, government, medical institutions"},{"Description":"Misallocation of resources due to panic shopping","Impact":"Depletion of essential supplies, escalation of prices, shortage for medical personnel","Mitigation":"Educate the public on the appropriate use of protective equipment, enforce measures to prevent panic shopping","Technologies":"Education campaigns, supply chain management technology","People":"General population, medical personnel, supply chain stakeholders","Owner":"Public health authorities, supply chain stakeholders, policymakers"}]}
